title: Tech Vantage - Corporate Website
description: Final Project for Internet Programming developing a functional system with some requirements such as Form Registration and Data Printing

title: Landing Page Meow Café
description: Project proposed by Codante where the goal was to bring the Meow Café design to life by transforming it into a functional and responsive page without the use of frameworks.

title: Insove Medical Healthcare Landing Page
description: Landing Page made using TailwindCSS designed for medical offices where the goal was to provide a good experience for doctors and patients.

title: Country List
description: Project proposed by Codante where the goal was to use an API to obtain the data by making a responsive application that uses Server Components, Data fetching, Nested layouts, Routes and Loading.

title: Name Finder
description: Final Project for Internet Programming where the goal was to create a name finder consuming an API on the backend, processing the data and displaying it on the frontend with a search history.

title: Dashboard
description: Dashboard with Login page, Registration, authentication, encryption, and a Dashboard

title: Google Keep Clone
description: Google Keep clone proposed to be made without frameworks where you can take notes, pin notes, duplicate notes and export notes to a CSV file.

title: API - Node Fastify
description: API made with the goal of performing a CRUD using a relational database

title: API - FastAPI
description: API made with FastApi with the goal of building a robust and modularized API in Python which was reused in my Scientific Initiation
